Charles Granval https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Granval 0 Charles Granval (December 21, 1882 – July 28, 1943) was a French stage and film actor. He was Jean-Pierre Granval's father. Charles_Granval ( December_21_,_1882 – July_28_,_1943 ) was a_French_stage_and_film_actor . He was Jean-Pierre_Granval 's_father .
